column4: I need help setting my locale (translations, etc) to en-us, as opposed to en-uk
I've set that before, but it's still en-uk. It doesn't seem to apply to pre-existing accounts
and if you reboot , it reverts to en-uk or does it stick to en-us ?
it hasn't changed yet, and it's been like this a while
try searching the forum for changing language
ok, I should've thought of that
my system is in canadian french,  and it is working ok , but thanks anyway
right, just so you know what it was.
I think he mean the application menu icon ( he wants to replace the ubuntu logo)
there have been howtos about it
